channel.title: Devops on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi
channel.description: Recent content in Devops on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi

item.title: Accelerate
item.description: The book consists of two, very different parts, plus a case study from the ING bank. Part one is a must read explanation of how DevOps practices can massively impact the business in a positive way and why. The second part is an explanation of the science that supports the claims presented in Part two.
